definitions.definition: A piece of furniture, usually flat and soft, on which to rest or sleep.
definitions.example:
My cat often sleeps on my bed.
I keep a glass of water next to my bed when I sleep.

definitions.definition: A place, or flat surface or layer, on which something else rests or is laid.
definitions.example: The meats and cheeses lay on a bed of lettuce.

definitions.definition: Senses relating to a bed as a place for resting or sleeping.
Senses relating to a bed as a place or layer on which something else rests or is laid.
